properties.name: max-length
properties.description: The largest positive representable number. The largest negative representable number is max-length.

properties.name: max-error-msg
properties.description: Error Message required to displayed after validation of max-length

properties.name: min-length
properties.description: The smallest positive representable number -- that is, the positive number closest to zero (without actually being zero). The smallest negative representable number is -min-length.

properties.name: min-error-msg
properties.description: Error Message required to displayed after validation of min-length

properties.name: allow-blank
properties.description: true to make this field required.

properties.name: place-holder
properties.description: A string value displayed in the input (if supported) when the control is empty.

properties.name: error-msg
properties.description: Error Message required to displayed after validation
